犫字的基本解释

犫
chōu
古同“犨”。

犫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōu］
［《廣韻》赤周切，平尤，昌。］
亦作“犫1”。
(1)牛息声。
(2)突出。《吕氏春秋·召类》：“南家之牆犨於前而不直。”高诱注：“犨，猶出。曲出子罕堂前也。”一说同“讎”，犹当，正对着。陈奇猷校释引洪颐煊曰：“犨，當爲讎。《漢書·灌夫傳》晉灼注：'讎，當也。'”

犫字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犫； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页705第25
【玉篇】尺由切。同犨。詳犨字註。　又【左傳·昭元年】楚公子圍使公子黑肱伯州犂城犫。【註】犫縣，屬南陽。【釋文】犫，尺州反。又【昭十三年】王奪?韋龜中犫。【註】中犫，邑名。　又人名。【左傳·僖二十七年】荀林父御戎，魏犫爲右。又【成十一年】晉侯使郤犫來聘。【釋文】犫，尺由反。　又【廣韻】赤周切【集韻】蚩周切，?音趎。義同。【呂覽】陳有惡人焉，曰敦洽犫糜，狹顙廣額，顏色如漆。陳侯悅之。

考證：〔【廣韻】陳有惡人焉，曰敦洽犫，狹顙廣額，顏色如漆。陳侯悅之。〕　謹按廣韻係引呂覽?爲據。今照原書廣韻改呂覽。?照原文敦洽犫下增糜字。
犫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
犫字的起名意思

暂无。

犫
Basic explanation of words
犫
chōu
Ancient with "Y".
犫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chōu］
["Guangyun" Chi Zhouqie, Pingyou, Chang. ]
Also known as "犫1".
(1) The sound of a cow's breath.
(2) Outstanding. "Lu Shichunqiu·Zhao Lei": "The wall of the Nan family is not straight in front." Gao You's note: "Y, still out. The song is out in front of Zihantang." Facing. Chen Qiyou's proofreading quote Hong Yixuan said: "Y, treat it as 雠. "Han Shu Guan Fu Biography" Jin Zhuo's note:'Yu, dang Ye.'"
犫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Bull Character Department] 　犫; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 705 No. 25
[Jade articles] The ruler is cut. Same as 犨. Detailed note of the word 犨.　[Zuo Zhuan·First Year of Zhao] Chu Gongzi encircled and encircled his son Heihu, Bozhou Licheng. 【Note】Yan County belongs to Nanyang. 【Explanation】Yi, Chizhou is against. Also【Thirteenth Year of Zhao】Wang Duo? Wei Guizhongyan. [Note] Zhongyu, the name of the town.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Seven Years] Xun Lin's father Yu Rong, Wei Yan is right. Also [in the eleventh year] Jin Hou's envoy came to hire him. [Explanation] 犫, the ruler is reversed.　 [Guang Yun] Chi Zhou cut [Ji Yun] Chi Zhou cut,? Sound. The same meaning. [Lv Lan] Chen You the wicked Yan, said Dun Qia Mi, narrow and wide, the color is like lacquer. Chen Hou Yuezhi. Textual research: [[Guangyun] Chen You Evil Yan, said Dun Qiayan, narrow and wide, the color is like lacquer. Chen Hou Yuezhi. 〕　I would like to quote Lu Lan according to the Guangyun Department. Today according to the original book Guangyun changed to Lu Lan. ?According to the original text, add the word “Mi” under Dun Qia.
